00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00031 #include "pwm.h"

00033 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00034 #define HTCFG_PWM_TM_AFIO_FUN                     STRCAT2(AFIO_FUN_, HTCFG_PWM_TM_IPN)
00035 #define HTCFG_PWM_TM_IRQn                         STRCAT2(HTCFG_PWM_TM_IPN,  _IRQn)
00036 #define HTCFG_PWM_TM_IRQHandler                   STRCAT2(HTCFG_PWM_TM_IPN,  _IRQHandler)
00037 
00038 #if (HTCFG_PWM_IDLE_STATE == 0)
00039 #define HTCFG_PWM_IDLE_DUTY PWM_DUTY_0
00040 #else
00041 #define HTCFG_PWM_IDLE_DUTY PWM_DUTY_100
00042 #endif
00043 
00044 #if (HTCFG_PWM0_EN == 1)
00045 #define HTCFG_PWM0_GPIO_ID                        STRCAT2(GPIO_P,    HTCFG_PWM0_GPIOX)
00046 #define HTCFG_PWM0_AFIO_PIN                       STRCAT2(AFIO_PIN_, HTCFG_PWM0_GPION)
00047 #endif
00048 
00049 #if (HTCFG_PWM1_EN == 1)
00050 #define HTCFG_PWM1_GPIO_ID                        STRCAT2(GPIO_P,    HTCFG_PWM1_GPIOX)
00051 #define HTCFG_PWM1_AFIO_PIN                       STRCAT2(AFIO_PIN_, HTCFG_PWM1_GPION)
00052 #endif

00057 #endif

00065 void _PWM_CH_Init(HT_TM_TypeDef* TMx, TM_CH_Enum TM_CH_n, TM_OutputInitTypeDef *OutInit);

00067 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00068 s32 gIsTMStop = 0;

00070 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00071 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00072   * @brief  Init PWM function.
00073   * @retval None
00074   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00075 void PWM_Init(void)
00076 {
00077   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00078     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00079     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_PWM_TM_IPN = 1;
00080     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO             = 1;
00081     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00082   }
00083 
00084   /* Configure AFIO mode as TM function                                                                     */
00085   #if (HTCFG_PWM0_EN == 1)
00086   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_PWM0_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_PWM0_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_PWM_TM_AFIO_FUN);
00087   #endif
00088   #if (HTCFG_PWM1_EN == 1)
00089   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_PWM1_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_PWM1_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_PWM_TM_AFIO_FUN);
00090   #endif
00091   #if (HTCFG_PWM2_EN == 1)
00092   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_PWM2_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_PWM2_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_PWM_TM_AFIO_FUN);
00093   #endif
00094   #if (HTCFG_PWM3_EN == 1)
00095   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_PWM3_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_PWM3_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_PWM_TM_AFIO_FUN);
00096   #endif
00097 
00098 
00099   { /* Time base configuration                                                                              */
00100 
00101     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00102        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00103        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below this function.
00104     */
00105     TM_TimeBaseInitTypeDef TimeBaseInit;
00106 
00107     TimeBaseInit.Prescaler = HTCFG_PWM_TM_PRESCALER - 1;            // Timer clock = CK_AHB / HTCFG_PWM_TM_PRESCALER
00108     TimeBaseInit.CounterReload = HTCFG_PWM_TM_RELOAD - 1;
00109     TimeBaseInit.RepetitionCounter = 0;
00110     TimeBaseInit.CounterMode = TM_CNT_MODE_UP;
00111     TimeBaseInit.PSCReloadTime = TM_PSC_RLD_IMMEDIATE;
00112     TM_TimeBaseInit(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, &TimeBaseInit);
00113     TM_CRRPreloadCmd(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, ENABLE);
00114 
00115     /* Clear Update Event Interrupt flag since the "TM_TimeBaseInit()" writes the UEV1G bit                 */
00116     TM_ClearFlag(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, TM_FLAG_UEV);
00117   }
00118 
00119   { /* Channel n output configuration                                                                       */
00120 
00121     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00122        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00123        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below this function.
00124     */
00125     TM_OutputInitTypeDef OutInit;
00126     #if 0
00127     OutInit.Channel = TM_CH_0; // Changed by "_PWM_CH_Init()"
00128     #endif
00129     OutInit.OutputMode = TM_OM_PWM1;
00130     OutInit.Control = TM_CHCTL_ENABLE;
00131     OutInit.ControlN = TM_CHCTL_DISABLE;
00132     OutInit.Polarity = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00133     OutInit.PolarityN = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00134     OutInit.IdleState = MCTM_OIS_LOW;
00135     OutInit.IdleStateN = MCTM_OIS_HIGH;
00136     OutInit.Compare = HTCFG_PWM_IDLE_DUTY;
00137     OutInit.AsymmetricCompare = 0;
00138 
00139     #if (HTCFG_PWM0_EN == 1)
00140     _PWM_CH_Init(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, PWM_CH0, &OutInit);
00141     #endif
00142 
00143     #if (HTCFG_PWM1_EN == 1)
00144     _PWM_CH_Init(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, PWM_CH1, &OutInit);
00145     #endif
00146 
00147     #if (HTCFG_PWM2_EN == 1)
00148     _PWM_CH_Init(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, PWM_CH2, &OutInit);
00149     #endif
00150 
00151     #if (HTCFG_PWM3_EN == 1)
00152     _PWM_CH_Init(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, PWM_CH3, &OutInit);
00153     #endif
00154   }
00155 
00156   #if (IS_IPN_MCTM(HTCFG_PWM_TM_IPN))
00157   {
00158     // Only MCTM need OE Enable
00159     MCTM_CHMOECmd(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, ENABLE);
00160 
00161     // Enable MT_CHnN
00162     //MCTM_ChannelNConfig(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, HTCFG_PWM_TM_CH, TM_CHCTL_ENABLE);
00163   }
00164   #endif
00165 
00166   /* Enable Update Event interrupt                                                                          */
00167   NVIC_EnableIRQ(HTCFG_PWM_TM_IRQn);
00168 
00169   #if 0 // Default enable or disable
00170   TM_Cmd(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, ENABLE);
00171   #endif
00172 }
00173 
00174 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00175   * @brief  This function handles TM interrupt.
00176   * @retval None
00177   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00178 void HTCFG_PWM_TM_IRQHandler(void)
00179 {
00180   TM_ClearFlag(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, TM_INT_UEV);
00181 
00182   if (gIsTMStop == 1)
00183   {
00184     gIsTMStop = 2;
00185   }
00186   else if (gIsTMStop == 2)
00187   {
00188     TM_Cmd(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, DISABLE);
00189 
00190     TM_IntConfig(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, TM_INT_UEV, DISABLE);
00191 
00192     gIsTMStop = 0;
00193   }
00194 }
00195 
00196 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00197   * @brief Enable or Disable PWM.
00198   * @param NewState: This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
00199   * @retval None
00200   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00201 void PWM_Cmd(ControlStatus NewState)
00202 {
00203   if (NewState == ENABLE)
00204   {
00205     TM_Cmd(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, NewState);
00206   }
00207   else
00208   {
00209     // Set the flag to stop timer after update event.
00210     gIsTMStop = 1;
00211 
00212     // Set PWM as IDLE duty before stop it
00213     #if (HTCFG_PWM0_EN == 1)
00214     PWM_UpdateDuty(PWM_CH0, HTCFG_PWM_IDLE_DUTY);
00215     #endif
00216     #if (HTCFG_PWM1_EN == 1)
00217     PWM_UpdateDuty(PWM_CH1, HTCFG_PWM_IDLE_DUTY);
00218     #endif
00219     #if (HTCFG_PWM2_EN == 1)
00220     PWM_UpdateDuty(PWM_CH2, HTCFG_PWM_IDLE_DUTY);
00221     #endif
00222     #if (HTCFG_PWM3_EN == 1)
00223     PWM_UpdateDuty(PWM_CH3, HTCFG_PWM_IDLE_DUTY);
00224     #endif
00225 
00226     TM_IntConfig(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, TM_INT_UEV, ENABLE);
00227   }
00228 }
00229 
00230 #if 0
00231 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00232   * @brief  Set PWM Frequency
00233   * @param  uReload: Reload value of timer)
00234   * @retval None
00235   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00236 void PWM_SetFreq(u32 uReload)
00237 {
00238   TM_SetCounterReload(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, uReload);
00239 }
00240 
00241 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00242   * @brief  Update PWM Duty
00243   * @param  TM_CH_n: Specify the TM channel.
00244   * @param  uCompare: PWM duty (Compare value of timer)
00245   * @retval None
00246   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00247 void PWM_UpdateDuty(TM_CH_Enum TM_CH_n, u32 uCompare)
00248 {
00249   TM_SetCaptureCompare(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, TM_CH_n, uCompare);
00250 }
00251 #endif
00252 
00253 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00254   * @brief  Init PWM Channel
00255   * @param  TMx: where TMx is the selected TM from the TM peripheral.
00256   * @param  TM_CH_n: Specify the TM channel.
00257   * @param  OutInit: Point to a TM_OutputInitTypeDef structure
00258   * @retval None
00259   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00260 void _PWM_CH_Init(HT_TM_TypeDef* TMx, TM_CH_Enum TM_CH_n, TM_OutputInitTypeDef* OutInit)
00261 {
00262   OutInit->Channel = TM_CH_n;
00263   TM_OutputInit(HTCFG_PWM_TM_PORT, OutInit);
00264   TM_CHCCRPreloadConfig(TMx, TM_CH_n, ENABLE);
00265 }

For complete information of HT32 Series 32-bit Microcontrollers platform visit Holtek Website
